title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
steps: Boil the pasta.
Cook the pancetta.
Mix eggs and cheese.
Combine pasta with pancetta and egg mixture.

title: Chicken Alfredo
description: Creamy Alfredo sauce with grilled chicken over fettuccine pasta.
steps: Cook the pasta.
Prepare the Alfredo sauce.
Grill the chicken.
Mix all together.

title: Pad Thai
description: A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish with tofu, peanuts, and tamarind sauce.
steps: Soak rice noodles in water.
Prepare tofu and vegetables.
Stir-fry with tamarind sauce and peanuts.
Serve hot.

title: Beef Burger
description: Classic American beef burger with lettuce, tomato, and cheese in a sesame seed bun.
steps: Season ground beef with salt and pepper.
Grill or pan-fry until cooked through.
Assemble burger with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
Serve with fries.

title: Margherita Pizza
description: Traditional Italian pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.
steps: Roll out pizza dough.
Spread tomato sauce evenly.
Top with mozzarella cheese and fresh basil leaves.
Bake in a preheated oven until crust is golden.

title: Sushi Rolls
description: Japanese sushi rolls with sticky rice, seaweed, and various fillings like tuna and avocado.
steps: Prepare sushi rice and fillings.
Lay seaweed sheet on bamboo mat.
Spread rice evenly, add fillings, and roll tightly.
Slice and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Indian chicken curry with a creamy tomato sauce and fragrant spices.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Grill or bake chicken until cooked.
Simmer in tomato and cream sauce with spices.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

title: Caesar Salad
description: Classic Caesar salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
steps: Toss chopped romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Add croutons and Parmesan cheese.
Mix well and serve chilled.

title: Ratatouille
description: French Provencal stewed vegetable dish with tomatoes, zucchini, eggplant, and bell peppers.
steps: Slice vegetables thinly.
Sauté in olive oil until tender.
Layer vegetables in a baking dish with tomato sauce.
Bake until flavors meld together.

title: Pho
description: Vietnamese noodle soup with aromatic broth, rice noodles, and herbs, often served with beef or chicken.
steps: Simmer broth with spices for several hours.
Cook rice noodles until tender.
Slice meat thinly and add to hot broth to cook.
Serve with herbs, lime, and chili.

title: Moussaka
description: Greek dish with layers of eggplant, ground meat, and béchamel sauce, baked to perfection.
steps: Slice and salt eggplant to remove bitterness.
Prepare meat sauce with ground beef and tomatoes.
Layer eggplant and meat sauce in baking dish.
Top with béchamel sauce and bake until golden brown.

title: Tacos
description: Mexican tacos with seasoned meat, salsa, avocado, and cilantro on corn tortillas.
steps: Cook seasoned meat until browned and cooked through.
Warm corn tortillas on a skillet.
Fill tortillas with meat, salsa, avocado, and cilantro.
Serve with lime wedges.

title: Salmon Teriyaki
description: Japanese grilled salmon with a sweet and savory teriyaki glaze.
steps: Marinate salmon fillets in teriyaki sauce.
Grill salmon until cooked through and caramelized.
Serve hot with steamed rice and vegetables.

title: Lasagna
description: Classic Italian pasta dish with layers of pasta, meat sauce, and creamy cheese filling.
steps: Cook lasagna noodles until al dente.
Prepare meat sauce with ground beef and tomatoes.
Make creamy cheese filling with ricotta and mozzarella.
Layer lasagna noodles, meat sauce, and cheese filling.
Bake until bubbly and golden brown.

title: Falafel Wrap
description: Middle Eastern wrap with crispy falafel, fresh vegetables, and tahini sauce in a soft pita.
steps: Prepare falafel mixture with chickpeas, herbs, and spices.
Form into balls and fry until crispy.
Warm pita bread and spread with tahini sauce.
Fill with falafel, vegetables, and additional sauce.
